actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

official_title: To deauthorize a feature of the project for navigation, Fall River Harbor, Massachusetts and Rhode Island.

summary.text: Deauthorizes the alteration of the Brightman Street Bridge drawspan, previously authorized as a feature of the project for navigation, Fall River Harbor, Massachusetts and Rhode Island, by specified provisions of the River and Harbor Act of 1968.

titles.title: To deauthorize a feature of the project for navigation, Fall River Harbor, Massachusetts and Rhode Island.
